name: GreekPup
short_description:
Hello! My name is Christos Koulaxizis and i'd like to welcome you to the GreekPup project! What am i doing here? I'm compiling & sharing packages for my favorite Linux distribution, Puppy Linux! This is not an official Puppy Linux repository, this is just my personal collection of Puppy stuff! Greetings from Greece! Woof woof!

- All packages are compiled and tested on Puppy Slacko.
summary: Personal Puppy Repository -  various packages for Puppy Linux
